org.elasticsearch.cluster

Class DiskUsage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.cluster.DiskUsage

  • public class DiskUsage
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulation class used to represent the amount of disk used on a node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiskUsage(java.lang.String nodeId, java.lang.String nodeName, java.lang.String path, long totalBytes, long freeBytes)
      Create a new DiskUsage, if totalBytes is 0, getFreeDiskAsPercentage() will always return 100.0% free
